roleset.name: apathetic towards ones own accomplishments

example.name: arg0, REC
example.text: The stagnant argument of *PRO* sticking to the beaten track and be self - complacent , the conservative claim of maintaining the status quo , the metaphysics of either this or that , = all these are forces of convention that can not meet the needs of the times . All these are anachronistic and ossified .

roleset.note: COMPLACENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7 (from complacent.01-j)
